value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    VIDEOS {
        UUID id PK
        TEXT title
        TEXT description
        TEXT file_path
        TEXT thumbnail_path
        INTERVAL duration
        BIGINT file_size
        INTEGER view_count
        TIMESTAMP upload_date
        TIMESTAMP last_viewed_at
    }
    TAGS {
        UUID id PK
        TEXT name
    }
    VIDEO_TAGS {
        UUID id PK
        UUID video_id FK
        UUID tag_id FK
    }
    USERS {
        UUID id PK
        TEXT username
        TEXT email
        TEXT password_hash
        TEXT role
        TIMESTAMP created_at
        TIMESTAMP last_login
    }
    VIEW_HISTORY {
        UUID id PK
        UUID user_id FK
        UUID video_id FK
        TIMESTAMP viewed_at
    }
    SYSTEM_LOGS {
        UUID id PK
        TEXT event_type
        TEXT event_description
        TIMESTAMP created_at
        UUID user_id FK
        INET ip_address
    }

    VIDEOS ||--o{ VIDEO_TAGS : "動画にタグ付け"
    TAGS ||--o{ VIDEO_TAGS : "タグが動画に関連付け"
    USERS ||--o{ VIEW_HISTORY : "ユーザーが視聴履歴を持つ"
    VIDEOS ||--o{ VIEW_HISTORY : "動画が視聴履歴を持つ"
    USERS ||--o{ SYSTEM_LOGS : "ユーザーに関連するログ"
